title: The Man Who Loved Too Much

infobox.Title:: The Man Who Loved Too Much
infobox.Japanese title:: 愛しすぎた男  (Aishi Sugita Otoko)
infobox.English title:: The Man Who Loved Too Much
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta (supervisor)  Kenichi Otomo  Marie Nagano (asst.)  Masanori Hashimoto (asst.)  Kyoko Yoshimi (asst.)
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Kyoko Yoshimi (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Ikuji Nose as Susumu Masuoka  Chihiro Suzuki as Shohei Sakuragawa  Satomi Akesaka as Erina Sakuragawa

sections.Situation: When Kogoro and Conan are going to buy some ingredients for dinner, they run into a crime scene in a house owned by a couple. It seems that the victim was burglarizing the house and that the husband killed him in self defense when he was about to attack his wife. However, Conan found out some evidences showing that the couple is lying.
sections.People:
- Victim (beaten)
- 38 years old
- Burglar
- 30 years old
- Erina's husband
- 28 years old
- Housewife
sections.Resolution:
- Shohei killed Masuoka in a misunderstanding that Erina had been cheating on him.
- Although not explicitly revealed, Erina's motive for hiring Masuoka to kill her husband is due to her suffocating from the marriage and that Shohei doesn't see her as anything more than "a beautiful person that is loved by him".
